text: Russell Carrington Wilson (born November 29, 1988) in Cincinnati, Ohio is the starting quarterback for the Denver Broncos. He wears the number 3. Wilson was selected by the Seahawks in the third round in the 2012 National Football League draft. He led the Seahawks to a Super Bowl win in 2014 against the Denver Broncos led by Peyton Manning. They won 43-8. He was the shortest quarterback to ever win a Super Bowl at 5'11". == References == Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Sportspeople from Cincinnati Category:Seattle Seahawks players
title: Russell Wilson
